name: Sleepy Jumper (Jam Version)
description:
You've had a long day and all you wanna do is sleep peacefully and have some good dreams. But those damn sleep bugs are trying to interrupt your journey to dreamland! So, what you have to do is avoid the sleep bugs and get to dreamland safely. But don't get caught, or else you'll instantly fall asleep and have only bad dreams!

MAKE SURE TO READ THE README!!!
